title: Justified West // A one-day typographic event presented by Langara College and the Society of Graphic Designers of Canada
content:
Submitted by [Zara Evens](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204113634/http:/typophile.com/user/111 "View user profile.") : 24.Mar.2009 10.58am 

JUSTIFIED WEST  
A one-day typographic event

Saturday April 25, 2009

Presented by Langara College and  
the Society of Graphic Designers of Canada

// THE DAY  
Justified West Event  
Registration: 8AM—9AM  
Speakers: 9AM—6PM

// THE SPEAKERS  
 [Marian Bantjes](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204113634/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Marian%2520Bantjes), [Stephen Coles](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204113634/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Stephen%2520Coles), [Si Daniels](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204113634/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Si%2520Daniels), [Zara Evens](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204113634/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Zara%2520Evens), [Shelley Gruendler](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204113634/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Shelley%2520Gruendler), [Michael Hernan](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204113634/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Michael%2520Hernan), [Richard Kegler](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204113634/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Richard%2520Kegler), [Kevin Larson](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204113634/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Kevin%2520Larson), [Emily Luce](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204113634/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Emily%2520Luce), [Thomas Phinney](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204113634/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Thomas%2520Phinney), [Geraldine Wade](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204113634/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Geraldine%2520Wade).

// THE EVENING  
 [Typophile Film Fest](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204113634/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typophile%2520Film%2520Fest) 4, presented by Punchcut  
Doors open: 7PM  
Films: 8PM—11PM  
Note: All Justified West attendees receive free entrance to the Typophile Film Fest. Tickets for the Typophile Film Fest only, will go on sale soon…

// COST  
Professionals: $175  
GDC Members: $150  
Students: $75  
Langara Students: $50  
Advance Registration Tickets on sale Now!  
To register, phone 604 323 5322  
and ask to register for Justified West  
Further Information Contact Dr Shelley Gruendler  
Email: [sgruendler@langara.bc.ca](mailto:sgruendler@langara.bc.ca)

// THE LOCATION  
PLAZA 500 Hotel, Vancouver BC  
Located at the corner of Cambie Street & 12th Avenue
author: Zara Evens
